author: bbockelm
body:
LZMA (plus more significant memory budget for writing) provides approximately a 20% reduction in per-event disk sizes at a cost of CPU time that measures O(1%) for GEN-SIM (writing) and DIGI-RECO (reading).

@davidlange6, @sextonkennedy - this is the compression change that we discussed approximately 3 weeks ago.  I just never got around to putting in a PR.
title: Convert RAWSIM to LZMA.
